item.title: By: ghiest
item.dc:creator: ghiest
item.description:
Guild mate of mine got two in the post, was quite amusing ... more so by the fact he couldn't use them because he lacked the skill.
Irony at its best.
item.content:encoded:
Guild mate of mine got two in the post, was quite amusing … more so by the fact he couldn’t use them because he lacked the skill.

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description: Doh, programmer not programming....wtb edit function.

item.title: By: Elbows
item.dc:creator: Elbows
item.description: Man, as a programming I kind of sympathize with these guys but christ, is it just me or do the NEVER get it right on the first try? You'd think with the kind of money Blizz can throw at developers they would be able to hire some star talent that could at least get one patch in 2 1/2 years right. I guess not.
item.content:encoded: Man, as a programming I kind of sympathize with these guys but christ, is it just me or do the NEVER get it right on the first try? You’d think with the kind of money Blizz can throw at developers they would be able to hire some star talent that could at least get one patch in 2 1/2 years right. I guess not.

item.title: By: Gev
item.dc:creator: Gev
item.description: Looks like Michael Bolton from Office Space made the program to check the percentages. Damn decimal points.
item.content:encoded: Looks like Michael Bolton from Office Space made the program to check the percentages. Damn decimal points.
